#bCaptain Al#k's next mission is for me to reach #r1,000 Rep#k! It's not an easy task by any means. According to Captain Al, this number cannot be achieved without the leadership and the overall support I provide to the Juniors. Captain Al gave me a clue in that I should help Juniors acquire EXP and help them Level Up as much as they can. EXP... leveling up... HOW?

#rAchieve 1,000 Rep#k
(Open the Family window to check the Rep)
I finally reached 1,000 in Rep! ...I have to thank the Juniors that really helped me get there.

Your active approach to this is what makes me feel like you'll run a great Family of your own. If you keep taking the active approach towards taking care of your Junior, then it won't be long until your name is reverberated all across the world of Maple. Are you ready to tackle the next mission?

The next mission I will be giving you is for you to achieve #r1,000 Reps#k, and... I can honestly say this will not be easy for you. Here's a pointer for you. You should provide as much support as you can to have your Juniors gain EXP and level up. If you can achieve this, then I can guarantee that you'll be a better Senior than I ever was. Let me know when you have completed this mission. I don't know if you remember this, but you can check your Rep through the #rFamily window [HotKey : F]#k.

It's understandable, since most people would be intimidated by having to achieve that. It's a daunting task, and it's understandable. Do not lose your confidence. That being said... I will never accept you in my Family.
